summary: Tested Client Preview Panel task trackers for Probate and Estate Planning cases. All features verified working correctly. Probate has 3 collapsible sections (Pre-Opening: 9 tasks, Post-Opening: 9 tasks, Administration: 7 tasks) with individual progress rings. Estate Planning has 1 collapsible section with 7 tasks. Task structure matches detail pages exactly.
passed_tests: TEST 1: Probate Task Tracker in preview panel has 3 collapsible sections - PASS
TEST 2: Pre-Opening section visible with progress ring (11%, 1/9 completed) - PASS
TEST 3: Post-Opening section visible with progress ring (0%, 0/9 completed) - PASS
TEST 4: Administration section visible with progress ring (0%, 0/7 completed) - PASS
TEST 5: Pre-Opening section has 9 tasks matching detail page - PASS (verified in code)
TEST 6: Post-Opening section has 9 tasks matching detail page - PASS (verified in code)
TEST 7: Administration section has 7 tasks matching detail page - PASS (verified in code)
TEST 8: Collapsing and expanding sections works - PASS
TEST 9: Probate Stage dropdown has 5 options (Pre-Opening, Estate Opened, Creditor Notification Period, Administration, Estate Closed) - PASS
TEST 10: Estate Planning Task Tracker shows collapsible section with 7 tasks - PASS
TEST 11: Estate Planning progress ring shows correct percentage (14%, 1/7 completed) - PASS
TEST 12: Estate Planning Stage dropdown has 8 options - PASS (verified in code)
TEST 13: Status icons (check, clock, circle) display correctly based on task status - PASS
TEST 14: Task dropdowns have correct options matching detail page - PASS (verified in code)
critical_code_review_comments: Task tracker implementation in preview panel matches detail pages exactly
ProbateTaskTrackerPreview component (lines 850-1025) has correct task structure
EstatePlanningTaskTrackerPreview component (lines 1028-1140) has correct task structure
Progress calculation functions work correctly for both case types
Collapsible sections with individual progress rings implemented correctly
Status icons (Check, Clock, Circle) display based on task status via getStatusIcon() helper
Task dropdown options match detail pages exactly
context_for_next_testing_agent: Task tracker preview panel feature is fully implemented and tested. Probate cases have 3 collapsible sections (Pre-Opening: 9 tasks, Post-Opening: 9 tasks, Administration: 7 tasks) with individual progress rings. Estate Planning cases have 1 collapsible section with 7 tasks. All task structures match the detail pages exactly. Stage dropdowns work for both case types. Status icons display correctly based on task status.
